issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Tizen
components.description: HTML5 os for phones tablets, IVI

fields.description:
NOTE: The app runs fine on the emulator which came with the 2.0.0 tizen sdk

Description:
1.Follow the setup instructions on the preview page & do the tizen setup
2.Connect the tizen device to the machine
3.Using CLI or studio create an app with tizen as target
4.Run on device

Actual Result:
1.The app launches & hangs at the appcelerator splash screen

Expected Result:
1.The app should not hang at the splash screen
fields.summary: Tizen : App hangs on the appcelerator splashscreen on device
fields.environment:
Ti studio : 3.1.0.201303240100
Ti sdk : 3.1.0.v20130325081923
Tizen sdk 2.0.0
win 7
win 8
tizen device running firmware: 2.0.0a3

comments.body:
Could you share wgt that reproduce issue please.
Could you share screenshot that show device and Tizen version please? 

I confused with firmware version 2.0.0a3. Is is 2.0alpha? If yes it wrong firmware for testing. We does not supports 2.0.0alpha because it is deprecates.  2.0alpha and 2.0  API is not compatible.
Test works fine with the latest SDK on the phone. We don't support phones with the old SDK.
